title: Tokens
description: Tokens are used to authenticate with the Coder API. You can create a token with the Coder CLI using the <1>{{cliCreateCommand}}</1> command.

deleteToken.deleteCaption:
Are you sure you want to delete this token?

<4>{{tokenId}}

createToken.title: Create Token
createToken.detail: Tokens are used to authenticate automated clients to Coder. All tokens are unscoped and therefore have full resource access.
